extendedInfo.description: *****************************************Note:  This softphone application will only work in conjunction with Cbeyondâs TotalCloud Phone System.  Please contact Cbeyond Support if you need assistance.  For set-up instructions and getting started guides please refer to the FindItFast Answer Center.Awards and Recognitions: Microsoft Gold Hosting Partner, Microsoft Partner of the Year 2009 & 2010, Forbes Americaâs Most Trustworthy Companies 2012*****************************************Cbeyond Communicator for Mobile is an application designed for Cbeyond TotalCloud Phone System (TCPS) customers with employees using smart phones.  By adding the Executive Feature Set to any TCPS Professional Seat, customers can provide employees with the same calling features that they have in the office.   Cbeyond Communicator for Mobile supports many current Android smartphones with version 2.3 or later.With Cbeyond Communicator for Mobile, employees can use their Android smartphone to place extension-to-extension calls, set personal call forwarding options and access their company directories.  Additionally, employees can use the Communicator for Mobile to place business calls using their work phone numbers.  Cbeyond Communicator is the ideal app for companies focused on increasing personal productivity and that want to keep employeesâ mobile phone numbers private.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is perfect for business professionals on the go. You have the flexibility to have your office phone at your fingertips. I would highly recommend this app if you are a on the go and need to take your business calls anywhere. Another great feature is the ability to work off of one number.
reviews.author: Cory Lambert

reviews.title: Awesome. What a game changer this has been!
reviews.author: Matt Edwards
